byline.original: By C.L. SULZBERGER By Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Brit planes from Greek bases bomb Tirana and Albanian ports
snippet: SALONIKA, Greece, Oct. 31-- British bombers flying from Greek bases bombed Tirana and several Albanian ports today, according to reports here....

headline.main: ALBANIA REPORTED BOMBED BY BRITISH; Planes Said to Have Damaged Capital and Several Ports --Craft Based in Greece

lead_paragraph: SALONIKA, Greece, Oct. 31-- British bombers flying from Greek bases bombed Tirana and several Albanian ports today, according to reports here.
